Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìgbìyànjú, ọlọ́hun á dé ìgbìyànju yín ládé.
English: Compliment for your effort, God will crown your effort.

Yoruba: Mi ò mọ̀ pé ó lè rẹwà báyìí, ẹ kú ìgbìyànjú.
English: I never knew that it will be this beautiful, compliment for your effort.

Yoruba: O káre ọmọ, o kú ìgbìyànjú.
English: Well done child, compliment for your effort.

Yoruba: Ẹ káábọ̀, ẹ kú ọjà.
English: Welcome, compliment for marketing.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ọjà o, ṣájé wá?
English: Compliment for marketing, how was sales?

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ọjà ìya oní gaàrí wa.
English: Compilment for marketing our gaàrí vendor.

Yoruba: Ìyá lájé wa, ẹ kú ọjà.
English: Our business mogul, compliment for marketing.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìrìn, ẹ sì ku ọjà.
English: Compliment for walking and compliment

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àfaradà, gbogbo rẹ̀ yóò dáa.
English: Compliment for your perseverance, all will be well.

Yoruba: Mo kíi yín, ẹ kú àfaradà.
English: I greet you, compliment for your perseverance.

Yoruba: Kò rọrùn rárá o, ẹ̀yin lẹ kú àfaradà.
English: It is not easy at all, compliment for your perseverance.

Yoruba: Má bìnú ayaà mi, o kú àfaradà.
English: Don’t be angry my wife, compliment for your perseverance.

Yoruba: Bá mi ṣe wọ́n pẹ̀lẹ́, wọ́n kú àfaradà.
English: Tell him/her sorry for me, and compliment for his/her perseverance.

Yoruba: Ó tọ́jọ́ mẹ́ta, ẹ kú àbéére ẹni.
English: It has been a while, compliment for not asking after me.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ọjọ́ gbọọrọ, ẹ sì kú àìbéére ẹni.
English: Quite an age, compliment for not asking after me.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àìbéére ẹni, ṣé bóṣe yẹ kó rí nìyẹn?.
English: Compliment for not asking after me, is that how it ought to be?

Yoruba: Ẹ kúàìbéére ẹni, àwá kúkú ń bère yín ní gbogbo ìgbà.
English: Compliment for not after after us, although we ask about you all the time.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àìbéére ẹni Iya Titó.
English: Compliment for not asking after me Titó’s mother.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àmójúba ọmọ tuntun yìí.
English: Compliment for reuniting with this new baby.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àmójúbà iná o.
English: Compliment for reuniting with power.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àmójúbà wa ẹ̀yin olólùfẹ wa.
English: Compliment for reuniting with us fans.

Yoruba: Ẹ káàsán ìya wa, ẹ kú àmójúbà ọmọ yín.
English: Good afternoon ma’am, compliment for reuniting with your son/daughter.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú oríire o, ẹ sì kú àmójúbà àwọn èyan yín.
English: Congratulations and compliment for reuniting with your people.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìjókòó, ẹ sì kú àpèjẹ.
English: Compliment for sitting and happy feasting.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìnáwó o, ẹ sì kú àpèjẹ.
English: Happy celebration and happy feasting.

Yoruba: Ẹ ṣeun tí ẹ pè mí bàbá, ẹ kú àpèjẹ.
English: Than you for inviting me father, happy feasting.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àpèjẹ, ìná ò ní tánwó yín.
English: Happy feasting, may your pocket never dry.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àpèjẹ ẹ̀yin olóyè.
English: Happy feasting chiefs.

Yoruba: Àjẹkì ni tòní, ẹ kú àsè.
English: It is a buffet party today, compliment for cooking.

Yoruba: Òórùn oúnjẹ yín ló gba gbogbo ilé kan yìí, ẹ kú àsè.
English: The aroma of your food is all over the house, compliment for cooking.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú asè, ẹ ṣáà má já wa nímú.
English: Compliment for cooking, please save our nose.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àsè ẹ̀yin alásè wa.
English: Compliment for cooking chefs.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àsè, ẹ sè é kó dùn.
English: Compliment for cooking, make it delicious.

Yoruba: Mo dúpẹ́ o, ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn.
English: I am grateful, compliment for your support.

Yoruba: Ẹ ṣeun, ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn.
English: Thank you, compliment for your support.

Yoruba: Ẹ ṣeun tí ẹ wá, ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn.
English: Thank you for coming, compliment for your support.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn mi, irú ẹ̀ lẹ ó fi gbà á.
English: Compliment for supporting me, make you get the same reward.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àtìlẹyìn bàba Ẹwà, mo mọ rírì yin.
English: Compliment for your support Ẹwà’s father, I appreciate you.

Yoruba: Kábíyèsi!́ Aláṣẹ ìkejì òrìṣà, ẹ kú oríkádún.
English: Great king! Second in command to the gods, happy birthday.

Yoruba: O kú oríkádún ọ̀rẹ́ mi, wà á ṣe ọ̀pọ̀ ọdún láyé.
English: Happy birthday my friend, may you celebrate more years on earth.

Yoruba: Mo báa yín yọ̀, ẹ kú oríkádún, ọ̀pọ rẹ̀ lẹ ó ṣe.
English: I rejoice with you, happy birthday, may you celebrate more of it.

Yoruba: O kú oríkádún ọlọ́jọ́ ìbí, o ò ní sọnù.
English: Happy birthday celebrant, you will not go missing.

Yoruba: Ẹ bá mi kí wọn, wọ́n kú oríkádún.
English: Extend my greetings to him/her, happy birthday.

Yoruba: Ẹ pẹ̀lẹ́, ẹ kú ìrọ́jú.
English: Sorry, compliment for your perseverance.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìrọ́jú, ọlọ́hun á kó o yín yọ.
English: Compliment for your perseverance, God will lead you through.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìrọ́jú, ọlọ́hun yóò rán aláànú síi yín.
English: Compliment for your perseverance, God will send you a helper.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìrọ́jú, ìgbà ọ̀tun yóò dé.
English: Compliment for your perseverance, a new dawn shall come.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìrọ́jú bàbá àgbà, a ò ní rí irú rẹ̀ mọ́.
English: Compliment for your perseverance grandpa, may you not witness such again.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú àjàbọ́, a ò ní rí irú rẹ̀ mọ́.
English: Compliment for escaping danger, may we not witness such again.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú oríire, ẹ sì kú àjàbọ́.
English: Congratulations and compliment for escaping danger.

Yoruba: Orí ló kóo yín yọ o, ẹ kú àjàbọ́.
English: God saved you, compliment for escaping danger.

Yoruba: Oríyọmí lorúkọ yín, ẹ kú àjàbọ́.
English: Victory is your name, compliment for escaping danger.

Yoruba: O kú àjàbọ́ ọ̀rẹ́ mi.
English: Compliment for escaping danger my friend.

Yoruba: Olóòtọ́ ènìyàn ni yín, ẹ kú ìfarajìn.
English: You are trustworthy, compliment for your commitment.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìfarajì ẹ̀yin ọmọ lẹ́yìn Jésù.
English: Compliment for your commitment Christ followers.

Yoruba: Sí ẹ̀yin òṣìṣẹ wa pàtàkì, ẹ kú ìfarajìn.
English: To our amiable staff, Compliment fot your commitment.

Yoruba: Ẹ kú ìfarajìn, ọlọ́run yóò san yín lẹ́san.
English: Compliment fo your commitment, may God reward you.

Yoruba: Gbogbo ìgbìyànju yín ni ọlọ́run rí, ẹ kú ìfarajìn.
English: God sees all your effort, compliment for your commitment.
